abstract: “The Real World,” the long-running MTV reality show, returns on Wednesday, this time set in Brooklyn.
snippet: “The Real World,” the long-running MTV reality show, returns on Wednesday, this time set in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: “The Real World,” the long-running MTV reality show, returns on Wednesday at 10 p.m., this time set in Brooklyn.

headline.main: ‘Real World’ Returns, This Time in Brooklyn
